member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.createAdaptor(System.String,System.Data.Common.DbConnection)
member.summary: Creates a SQLiteDataAdapter from a select command. This adaptor is for filling a datatable and may not contain insert,update, or delete commands.
member.param: Select command used to generate Adaptor
optional connection object. If ommited it uses the helper's default connection.
member.returns: a SQLiteDataAdapter typed to the base helper
member.remarks: The default connection uses web config connection string named 'DTIConnection' or 'ConnectionString'

member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.createCommand(System.String,System.Data.Common.DbConnection)
member.summary: Creates a SQLiteCommand from a sqlite command string.
member.param: Select command used to generate SQLiteCommand
optional connection object. If ommited it uses the helper's default connection.
member.returns: a SQLiteCommand typed to the base helper
member.remarks: The default connection uses web config connection string named 'DTIConnection' or 'ConnectionString'

member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.createConnection(System.String@)
member.summary: Creates a typed connection from a string.

member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.createParameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a typed dbParameter from a name and value

member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.createParameter(System.Data.Common.DbParameter@)
member.summary: Creates a typed parameter from a genric DbParameter

member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.processSelectCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Converts select from TSQL to SQLite. Top and isnull are made SQLite compliant.

member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.ProcessDataAdaptor(System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter@,System.String,System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Called on creation of a new DbAdaptor

member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.checkDBObjectExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a datatable exists in a database.
member.param: The name of the table that may eexist in the database.

member.name: M:SQLiteHelper.SQLiteHelper.getCreateTableString(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Builds a create script for a table in the database based on the schema of the datatable passed in.
member.param: The datatable that is usedto build the create String. Only schema is used, data is ignored.
